description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle Outside In Technology component in Oracle Fusion Middleware 8.5.0, 8.5.1, and 8.5.2 allows local users to affect availability via vectors related to Outside In Filters, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-6013, CVE-2015-6014, CVE-2015-6015, and CVE-2016-0432.
